text:
Every year has a feud that marks it. The past four years have been the stage for Katy Perry and Taylor Swift to take down each other very publicly. They have been at each others’ necks since 2014 because of an argument over backing dances. It now seems as though the fight has come to an end as Katy took the first step forward to make peace by sending Taylor an olive branch.

An olive branch is obviously a symbol of peace, so we suppose both are meant to forgive the fact that Taylor wrote Bad Blood about Katy and that Katy’s Swish Swish is a dig at Taylor. It seems like that is the case. Taylor posted on the package Katy sent her on her Instagram Story.

Katy Perry sent Taylor an olive branch for the opening night of the reputation Stadium Tour! pic.twitter.com/6GDamcxezI — Taylor Swift Updates (@TSwiftPR) May 8, 2018

In the video, Taylor said:

“I just got to my dressing room and found this actual olive branch. This means so much to me.”

There was a note from Katy too but it was a little harder to read. Swift fans are sceptical, is this an actual truce or is Katy scheming?

What do you think?
title: Katy Perry & Taylor Swift call a truce, finally
